column2: Nova School of Business and Economics
column5: The Master’s in Finance prepares students for a successful career in the financial industry and offers them a solid theoretical foundation taught by the top-10 rated finance faculty, who incorporate the latest research findings in their curriculum.It also offers its students a practical experience through hands-on consulting projects, allowing them to manage the endowed Nova Student portfolio management and internships.A program that is analytical and professional, which provides students the tools for critical problem assessment and resolution – whether it be in M&A, entrepreneurship, banking, asset management, real estate, or private equity.
